p: Lastly, the spatial aggregation enhanced stepwise relative to the previous two waves based on the definition of the cluster[ 14]. The epidemic presented some relatively dispersed characteristics since the third wave with cases reported fewer than two in most counties, but the epidemic showed a reinforcing trend again in the fifth wave (Figs 5 and 7). In general, the affected areas continued to expand, and the epidemic may have been circulated in some new areas with no previously reported cases (Figs 5 and 7).
